thread.title: Continuum Adds LogMeIn as Silver Sponsor of Navigate 2015
thread.title_full: Continuum Adds LogMeIn as Silver Sponsor of Navigate 2015

title: Continuum Adds LogMeIn as Silver Sponsor of Navigate 2015
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Sep 16, 2015, 13:17 BST - UK Markets close in 3 hrs 13 mins Continuum Adds LogMeIn as Silver Sponsor of Navigate 2015 Continuum’s Remote Access Technology Partner Supports Second Annual User Conference – September 27-29, 2015 – Las Vegas for Second Consecutive Year Press Release : Continuum Managed IT Services – 17 minutes ago Related Content 
BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Continuum ® , the industry’s only channel-exclusive provider of fully integrated managed IT services solutions, has added LogMeIn, Inc . as a Silver Sponsor of Navigate 2015 , the company’s second annual user conference on Sunday, September 27 – Tuesday, September 29, 2015 at The Cosmopolitan™ of Las Vegas. Continuum offers LogMeIn’s premier remote access, LogMeIn Pro , as part of an exclusive partnership for its Managed Services Provider (MSP) partners. Continuum also offers LogMeIn Rescue , LogMeIn's flagship remote support, as part of Continuum's intelligent Remote Monitoring and Management (RMM) software backed by its industry-leading 24x7x365 Network Operations Center (NOC). 
“Remote connectivity is critical for our MSP partners and the combination of LogMeIn’s remote access and Continuum’s RMM/BDR solution continues as the best available for our MSP partners,” said Jeanne Hopkins , Senior Vice President & CMO at Continuum. “We are delighted to have LogMeIn’s sponsorship at Navigate 2015.” 
LogMeIn Pro provides fast, easy remote access to PCs or Macs from any browser, desktop and mobile devices. With millions of users worldwide, the company’s cloud-based solutions make it possible for people and companies to connect and engage with their workplace, colleagues, customers and products anywhere, anytime. 
“Continuum and LogMeIn share a common vision for helping channel providers serve the evolving needs of today’s increasingly cloud and mobile workplaces,” said W. Sean Ford , CMO of LogMeIn. “We see Continuum as an important and strategic partner to both LogMeIn and the channel, and we’re excited to support and join Continuum and their channel community at Navigate 2015.” 
Navigate 2015 is a 3-day educational and training event for the industry’s top MSP partners and IT resellers led by top business and channel leaders. Download the Navigate 2015 Mobile App to create your own custom agenda, network with attendees and more at: https://events.crowdcompass.com/navigate . 
Navigate 2015 is sold out. To join the waitlist, visit: 
For more information on the conference, visit: http://www.continuum.net/navigate2015 . For the latest updates, follow #nav15 on Twitter . 
About Continuum Managed IT Services 
Continuum is the technology industry's only channel-exclusive provider of fully integrated managed IT services, allowing its Managed Services Provider (MSP) partners to maintain both on premise and cloud-based servers, desktops, mobile devices and other endpoints for small-and-medium-sized businesses. Continuum’s SaaS platform enables MSPs to efficiently backup, monitor, troubleshoot and maintain clients’ IT infrastructurefrom a single pane of glass, all backed by an industry–leading network operations center (NOC) and Help Desk. The company employs over 1,000 professionals worldwide, supports 3,500 partners servicing 50,000 SMB customers and monitors over 700,000 endpoints. In 2012, Continuum established the Continuum Veterans Foundation, a nonprofit organization providing financial support to charities focused on helping veterans find jobs in IT. For more information, visit http://www.continuum.net/ or follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter @FollowContinuum . All trademarks recognized.
